segments.text: Mum , I have something for you today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you remember ? Today is March 8th . It's Women's Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , close your eyes . ( Mum closes her eyes and Steven puts the present in her hand . )
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A silk scarf . I love it . Thank you very much . My lovely son .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Happy Women's Day . I love you forever , Mum .
segments.speaker: S1
